comments.author: b
comments.content:
No worries - SA is the most civilized part of Africa, and while things like crime still exist, if you simply remember that it's not Japan and act with a bit of common sense/caution, it's no big deal.

Also, you can't get HIV from mosquito bites.... or your hand ;P
